1.2.name: wordpress/moonvipercmscom
1.2.description:
Spoil Me is a plugin for WordPress, designed to protect the reader against spoilers, for example in book or filmreviews. The spoiler text is hidden by default and shows up if wished.

To mark a text as spoiler, enclose the passage with [spoiler] and [/spoiler].

Features

  • Very fast, less code
  • Customizeable with CSS
